title: Zengo wallet
description:
Zengo is powered by MPC instead of a vulnerable seed phrase - stay zen knowing your assets are virtually unhackable.

Multi-chain crypto wallet supporting Bitcoin, Ethereum, Polygon, multiple stablecoins and over 120 other assets.
With Zengo’s 24/7 human support team, you’re always one tap away from help - in your own language.

Use Zengo to store, buy, sell, swap, send and receive crpyto.
Or to use NFTs, DeFi, and thousands of other Web3 Dapps.

Upgrade your crypto security today, with Zengo.
